metadata.title: CVE-2017-7436 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In libzypp before 20170803 it was possible to retrieve unsigned packages without a warning to the user which could lead to man in the middle or malicious servers to inject malicious RPM packages into a users system.

notes.note: sbeattie> likely requires zypper changes, too

criterions.comment: libzypp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '17.6.1-1').
